verses.verse: Then came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, even the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%>, into the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>; and Miryam <S%H4813><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> there.

And there was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation <S%H5712><s%>: and they gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves together against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and against Aharon <S%H175><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> chode <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Would 'Elohim that <S%H3863><s%> we had died <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8804><s%> when our brethren <S%H251><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> !

And why have ye brought up <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> into this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that we and our cattle <S%H1165><s%> should die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> there?

And wherefore have ye made us to come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8687><s%> us in unto this evil <S%H7451><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>? it is no place <S%H4725><s%> of seed <S%H2233><s%>, or of figs <S%H8384><s%>, or of vines <S%H1612><s%>, or of pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>; neither is there any water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and they fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto them.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%>, and gather <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thou the assembly <S%H5712><s%> together, thou, and Aharon <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> ye unto the rock <S%H5553><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>; and it shall give forth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his water <S%H4325><s%>, and thou shalt bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to them water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H5553><s%>: so thou shalt give <S%H8248><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and their beasts <S%H1165><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, as he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> together before <S%H6440><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now, ye rebels <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; must we fetch <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> you water <S%H4325><s%> out of this rock <S%H5553><s%> ?

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> lifted up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and with his rod <S%H4294><s%> he smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%> twice <S%H6471><s%>: and the water <S%H4325><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> abundantly <S%H7227><s%>, and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> drank <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and their beasts <S%H1165><s%> also.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Because ye believed <S%H539><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me not, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8687><s%> me in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, therefore ye shall not bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> this congregation <S%H6951><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

This is <S%H1992><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%>; because the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and he was sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in them.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the travail <S%H8513><s%> that hath befallen <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us:

How our fathers <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and we have dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%>; and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> vexed <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us, and our fathers <S%H1><s%>:

And when we cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> our voice <S%H6963><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%>, and hath brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and, behold, we are in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, a city <S%H5892><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> of thy border <S%H1366><s%>:

Let us pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I pray thee, through thy country <S%H776><s%>: we will not pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through the fields <S%H7704><s%>, or through the vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, neither will we drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the wells <S%H875><s%>: we will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the king's <S%H4428><s%> high way <S%H1870><s%>, we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left <S%H8040><s%>, until we have passed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy borders <S%H1366><s%>.

And Edom <S%H123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Thou shalt not pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by me, lest I come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, We will go <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the high way <S%H4546><s%>: and if I and my cattle <S%H4735><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thy water <S%H4325><s%>, then I will pay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H4377><s%> for it: I will only, without doing any thing <S%H1697><s%> else, go through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on my feet <S%H7272><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thou shalt not go through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. And Edom <S%H123><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him with much <S%H3515><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Thus Edom <S%H123><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> passage <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> through his border <S%H1366><s%>: wherefore Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> turned away <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from him.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, even the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%>, journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, by the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>: for he shall not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, because ye rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my word <S%H6310><s%> at the water <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%>.
Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and bring them up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>:

And strip <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8685><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> of his garments <S%H899><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them upon Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>: and Aharon <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto his people, and shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: and they went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> stripped <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> of his garments <S%H899><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them upon Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>; and Aharon <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there in the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>: and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And when all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Aharon <S%H175><s%> was dead <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, they mourned <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for Aharon <S%H175><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, even all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
